info.description: Private File Storage System API documentation
info.title: PFSS API

post.description: Register a new user with username and password

get.description: Get a list of buckets with pagination
Get details of a specific bucket

post.description:
Upload a file to a specific bucket. The file will be stored in the 'upload/{bucket_name}' directory.
The file name will be made unique by appending a timestamp.

parameters.description: Target bucket ID to upload the file to
parameters.name: bucket_id

parameters.description: The file to upload (supports any file type)
parameters.name: file

400.description: Invalid request, missing file, or invalid bucket ID

403.description: Permission denied - requires write access to bucket

get.description: Get a list of files in a bucket with pagination
Get details of a specific file
Get a pre-signed URL for file download
Get a pre-signed URL for file upload
Get a list of users with pagination

post.description: Change user password with old and new password

get.description: Get details of a specific user
